content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Ore Extraction and Processing Facility at Position (-14.0, -53.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-14.0, -53.0) extracting iron ore.
- Transport belts connecting the mining drill to a wooden chest at position (-12.5, -54.5).
- Burner Inserter at position (-13.5, -54.5) transferring items from the belt to the chest.
- Wooden Chest at position (-12.5, -54.5) storing extracted iron ore.

### Iron Plate Production Facility
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at position (-21.0, -62.0) processing iron ore into iron plates.
- Stone Furnace at position (-18.0, -70.0) processing iron ore into iron plates.
- Stone Furnace at position (0.0, 0.0) processing iron ore into iron plates.
- Transport belts and burner inserters facilitating the movement of materials between furnaces and storage chests.

### Copper Ore Extraction Facility at Position (-23.0, -68.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-23.0, -68.0) extracting copper ore.
- Transport belts connecting the mining drill to a wooden chest at position (-23.5, -69.5).
- Wooden Chest at position (-23.5, -69.5) storing extracted copper ore.

### Coal Storage Facility at Position (52.5, -84.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Wooden Chest at position (52.5, -84.5) storing coal.
- Burner Mining Drill at position (53.0, -83.0) extracting coal and depositing it into the chest.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when attempting to insert items from an empty inventory
- Ensure that the items you wish to insert are available in your inventory before attempting to insert them into another entity. Check your inventory for the required items and quantities.

### Errors when using inserters waiting for source items
- Ensure that the source entity has items available for the inserter to pick up. If the inserter is waiting for source items, verify that the source entity is properly stocked or connected.
